summary: Animal Friend makes wolves, bears, sabre cats, mammoths, horkers, dogs (including bandit and forsword varieties), and spriggans friendly to the player. Also prey animals such as deer, hares, and foxes will not flee from the player.
descriptionHtml:
Animal Friend
Author: SubRosa_Florens
Version: 1.1

Description:
Tired of being attacked by every wolf, bear, and spriggan you meet? Ever want to play a character who was truly one with the forest? Well now you can. Animal Friend makes wolves, bears, sabre cats, mammoths, horkers, dogs (including bandit and forsword varieties), and spriggans friendly to the player. Also prey animals such as deer, hares, and foxes will not flee from the player.

I recommend using this mod in conjunction with the Nature Summoning mod, which allows you to summon the same animals that this mod makes friendly to you. You can find it at: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10733


Installation:
Simply copy the Animal Friend.esp file to your Skyrimdata folder. When you start Skyrim, select the Animal Friend mod.


Version History:
1.0 -
Original Release

1.1
Made mudcrabs and skeevers friendly as well.
author: SubRosa_Florens
